da: Virkelig? Det er dejligt at høre! Det betyder, at jeg ikke behøver at bekymre mig om et fald i reservationer.
Du lyder dog lidt usikker... Er du sikker på, at alt er okay, @CharacterName?
Jøses... du bed i græsset, hva'... Det kan jeg bestemt se. Nå, du må hellere være optimistisk!
I arbejder alle hårdt på at få krystallerne tilbage, ik'?
...Førstehjælp er i skuffen til venstre for mig, hvis du har brug for det...
Fordi, du ved, dit ansigt er stadig lidt rødt.
en: Really? That's great to hear! Means I don't have to worry 'bout a decrease in reservations.
You sound a little unsure, though... Ya sure everything's okay, @CharacterName?
Yikes... Flat on your face, huh... I can definitely see that. Well, best to stay optimistic!
You're all workin' hard to get the crystals back, aren't ya?
You do that, and I'll make sure ya have a room to stay in.
...First-aid's in the drawer on my left, if ya have any need for that...
Because, ya know, your face is still a lil' red.
